snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. All sixty employees of Sage Realty Corporation, its Directors and Officers, deeply mourn the loss of their President, Robert Kaufman. We could ask for no greater leader and mentor. Robert joined Sage Realty in 1949 shortly after graduating from New York University in its first class offering a Bachelor in Science in Real Estate. In his 67-year career at Sage, he built the firm into one of the preeminent real estate companies in New York City, along with his father, William and his brother, Melvyn. He oversaw the development of over 6 million square feet of office space that still stands to this day in Manhattan. Even greater is the human legacy of respect, love and admiration held by all those who worked with him in this company and in the real estate industry. The Employees of Sage Realty Corporation 1/3
